Python Module Index

c | d | f | k | l | m | n | p | s
 
c
constants (Unix) A submodule defining some constants used by the fit package.
 
d
dataset (Unix) This submodule defines a `Dataset` object, a container class for storing measurement data and error data.
 
f
file_tools (Unix) This submodule provides a set of helper functions for parsing files
fit (Unix) This submodule defines a `Fit` object which performs the actual fitting given a `Dataset` and a fit function.
function_library (Unix) A submodule containing a collection of model functions.
 
k
kafe
    kafe.__init__
    kafe._version_info
    kafe.constants
    kafe.dataset
    kafe.file_tools
    kafe.fit
    kafe.function_library
    kafe.function_tools
    kafe.latex_tools
    kafe.minuit
    kafe.numeric_tools
    kafe.plot
    kafe.stream
 
l
latex_tools (Unix) This submodule contains several useful tools for handling :math:`LaTeX` expressions.
 
m
minuit (Unix) A submodule providing the `Minuit` object, which communicates with CERN *ROOT*'s function minimizer *Minuit*.
 
n
numeric_tools (Unix) A submodule containing several numeric algorithms used by the fit package, such as methods for converting beween covariance and correlation matrices or extracting the statistical errors from a covariance matrix.
 
p
plot (Unix) A submodule for plotting `Dataset`s with ``matplotib``.
 
s
stream (Unix) A submodule containing an object for simultaneous output to file and to ``sys.stdout``.

Project Info and Contact

This project originated at the Institute of Experimental Nuclear Physics (IENP) at the Karlsruhe Insitute of Technology (KIT). The software was developed as part of Bachelor's Thesis in Physics.

The author may be contacted at:

Daniel Săvoiu

(at)
student (dot) kit (dot) edu
